metadata.title: CVE-2019-14317 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL and wolfCrypt 4.1.0 and earlier (formerly known as CyaSSL) generatebiased DSA nonces. This allows a remote attacker to compute the long termprivate key from several hundred DSA signatures via a lattice attack. Theissue occurs because dsa.c fixes two bits of the generated nonces.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
